metadata.title: CVE-2016-8676 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: The get_vlc2 function in get_bits.h in Libav 11.9 allows remote attackersto cause a denial of service (NULL pointer dereference and crash) via acrafted mp3 file.  NOTE: this issue exists due to an incomplete fix forCVE-2016-8675.

criterions.comment: libav: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
